pages.title: Agricraft Integration
pages.text: It seems that Sanguimancy can be of use, even when working with advanced agricultural techniques. Both the $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_green_grove)Ritual of the Green Grove$() and the $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/sigil/grove)Sigil of the Green Grove will speed up the growth of such plants (and inhibit the growth of weeds, should your world be unlucky enough to be blighted with such a thing).

Moreover, the $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_harvest)Reap of the Harvest Moon$() will keep harvested plants safe, as if you had gathered their produce with your own tender hands. $(br2)If you think you see any weeds, no you didn't. (It's a minor visual bug. Don't worry about it.)
